question:
####[NISEI](https://nisei.net) [Uprising Release Notes](https://nisei.net/files/Uprising_Release_Notes.pdf) [NISEI Rules Team]
Does Prognostic Q-Loop require the Runner to pay the install cost when they use it to install a program or piece of hardware?
answer: Yes. Effects that allow players to install cards require them to pay their normal costs unless specifically stated.
